original_title: Sujeewa Peiris elected to CSE Board of Directors
original_body_lines: Sujeewa Peiris was elected to the Board of the Colombo Stock Exchange (CSE) with effect from 09th August 2023. Peiris joined Bartleet Group in 1990 and has played a pivotal role in the growth and development of Bartleet Religare Securities (Pvt) Ltd., formerly known as Bartleet Mallory Stockbrokers. Having started his career in stock brokering as a Documentation Officer,  Peiris has progressed to become a leading and highly recognized Stockbroker/Investment Advisor licensed by the Securities and Exchange Commission of Sri Lanka (SEC).

He has been successful in building up a strong network of investors spread across domestic institutions, high net worth Individuals and retail investors.  Peiris was promoted to Manager Sales in 2001 and for his immense contribution to Bartleet Mallory Stockbrokers, he was appointed as a Director in 2008. Under his leadership and guidance, Bartleet Religare Securities built a very strong investment advisory team spread across key strategic/commercial districts of the country.

At present, Peiris serves as the Director/CEO at Bartleet Religare Securities (Pvt) Ltd. He has been instrumental in providing a strong leadership to Bartleet Religare Securities. He also serves on the Board of Dipped Products PLC as an Independent Non-Executive Director.
